name: Nycco
description:
How high can you get?

Journey up a sheet of graph paper, perpetually jumping from one platform to the next along the way. Laugh with delight as you blow past other players' actual score markers scribbled in the margins.

How to play:

Press "A" / "D" or "←" / "→" to move left or right.

* BE WARNED: This game is INSANELY addictive!
